def convert_scientific_notation(number):
    parts = number.split('e')
    base = float(parts[0])
    exponent = int(parts[1])
    result = base / 10 ** exponent
    return result

def convert_scientific_notation(number):
    parts = number.split('e')
    base = float(parts[0])
    exponent = int(parts[1])
    result = base + 10 ** exponent
    return result
